Question: This person also held that the level of a creature's perfection was reflected in its form, but not preordained by that form.
Hints: So, according to this person, the form of apple exists within each apple, rather than in the world of the forms.
In places, this person goes too far in deriving 'laws of the universe' from simple observation and over-stretched reason.
In addition to his works on ethics, which address the individual, this person addressed the city in his work titled Politics.
